mapper.select: SELECT l.id, l.name, l.owner FROM logbooks l, statuses s WHERE l.is_tag = FALSE AND l.status_id = s.id AND s.name = 'Active'
SELECT l.id, l.name, l.owner FROM logbooks l, statuses s WHERE l.is_tag = FALSE AND l.status_id = s.id AND s.name = 'Active' AND l.name = #{name}
SELECT id, name FROM logbooks WHERE LOWER(name) = #{name}

SELECT id, name FROM logbooks WHERE LOWER(name) IN
#{item}
mapper.update: UPDATE logbooks l, statuses s SET l.status_id = s.id WHERE s.name = 'Inactive' AND l.id = #{id}
UPDATE logbooks l, statuses s SET l.status_id = s.id WHERE s.name = 'Inactive' AND l.id = #{id}
UPDATE logs_logbooks ll, statuses s SET ll.status_id = s.id WHERE s.name = 'Inactive' AND logbook_id = #{id}
UPDATE logs_logbooks ll, statuses s, logs l SET ll.status_id = s.id WHERE s.name = 'Inactive' AND ll.logbook_id = #{lid} AND ll.log_id = l.id AND (l.id = #{logid} OR l.parent_id = #{logid})
UPDATE logbooks l, statuses s SET l.name = #{name}, l.owner = #{owner}, l.is_tag = FALSE, l.status_id = s.id WHERE l.name = #{name} AND s.name = 'Active'
UPDATE logbooks SET name = #{name}, owner = #{owner} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO logbooks (name, owner, is_tag) VALUE (#{name}, #{owner}, FALSE)
